title: (x) "Break 'n Bossa - The American Chapter" album cover - Helvetica UltraComp, Cruz Swinger {Thomas B, Ignacio}
content:
It has that House IND ‘look’ but its not and I think I have seen it before. I would like to know the other sans faces too but this image is not adequate.

Any Ideas…Thank you…Mikey

 ![](http://web.archive.org/files/INS563_4034.jpg)
author: SuperUltraFabulous

comments.content:
I absolutely love this Bossa + Drum ‘n Bass music.

The _b_ looks like it’s falling over on its back, had _o_ not supported it :-)

“break’n” looks like Helvetica ultracompressed to me.  
“the american chapter” could be a (regular) Helvetica, also. (A little bit to small to get it right)
